column2: # This graph shows the max daily temperature data observed by the different stations over a span of 6 years. The correlation of temperature over time is quite evident. It would be awkward if it was warm during the summer.
ggplot(noaa_data, aes(x = date, y = TMAX, color = station)) +
ggtitle("Daily Max temperature observed by all weather stations in MA between 2012 and 2017") +
